trans-unit.source: Represents an easing function that retracts the motion of an animation slightly before it begins to animate in the path indicated.
trans-unit.target: Representa uma função de easing retira o movimento de um animação ligeiramente antes de iniciar animar no caminho indicado.

trans-unit.source: You can control when the "back up" behavior occurs in an animation by specifying the <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.EasingFunctionBase.EasingMode%2A> property value on an animation.
trans-unit.target: Pode controlar quando o comportamento "cópia de segurança" ocorre uma animação especificando o <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.EasingFunctionBase.EasingMode%2A>valor da propriedade num animação.</xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.EasingFunctionBase.EasingMode%2A>

trans-unit.source: The following graph demonstrate the different values of <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.EasingFunctionBase.EasingMode%2A>, where *f*(*t*) represents the animation progress and *t* represents time.
trans-unit.target: O gráfico seguinte demonstrar valores diferentes de <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.EasingFunctionBase.EasingMode%2A>, onde *f*(*t*) representa o progresso de animação e *t* representa tempo.</xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.EasingFunctionBase.EasingMode%2A>

trans-unit.source: ![BackEase EasingMode graphs.](~/add/media/backease-graph.png "BackEase EasingMode graphs.")
trans-unit.target: ![BackEase EasingMode gráficos. ] (~/add/media/backease-graph.png "BackEase EasingMode gráficos.")

trans-unit.source: The formula used for this function is the following.
trans-unit.target: A fórmula utilizada para esta função é o seguinte.

trans-unit.source: ![BackEase formula.](~/add/media/backease-formula.png "BackEase formula.") > [!NOTE]
trans-unit.target: ![Fórmula BackEase. ] (~/add/media/backease-formula.png "BackEase fórmula.") > [!NOTE]

trans-unit.source: > Because this animation causes values to retract before progressing, the animation might interpolate into negative numbers unexpectedly.
trans-unit.target: > Porque este animação faz com que os valores retrair antes de evoluir, a animação poderá interpolate inesperadamente em números negativos.

trans-unit.source: This can cause errors when animating properties that do not allow negative numbers.
trans-unit.target: Isto pode causar erros quando animating propriedades que não permitem números negativos.

trans-unit.source: For example, if you apply this animation to the <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.Height%2A> of an object (e.g. from 0 to 200 with an <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.EasingFunctionBase.EasingMode%2A> of <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.EasingMode>), the animation will attempt to interpolate through negative numbers for <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.Height%2A> which will throw an error.
trans-unit.target: Por exemplo, se aplicar este animação para o <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.Height%2A>de um objeto (por exemplo, de 0 a 200 com um <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.EasingFunctionBase.EasingMode%2A>de <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.EasingMode>), a animação tentará interpolate através de números negativos para <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.Height%2A>que irá gerar um erro.</xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.Height%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.EasingMode> </xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.EasingFunctionBase.EasingMode%2A> </xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.Height%2A>

trans-unit.source: There are several other easing functions besides BackEase which you can explore using the following Silverlight sample.
trans-unit.target: Existem várias outras funções easing além BackEase que pode explorar utilizando o exemplo seguinte do Silverlight.

trans-unit.source: [Run this sample](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=139798&sref=easing_functions_gallery) In addition to using the easing functions included in the run-time, you can create your own custom easing functions by inheriting from <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.EasingFunctionBase>.
trans-unit.target: [Executar este exemplo](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=139798&sref=easing_functions_gallery) além de utilizar as funções easing incluídas no tempo de execução, pode criar as suas próprias funções easing personalizadas ao herdar de <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.EasingFunctionBase>.</xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.EasingFunctionBase>

trans-unit.source: ## XAML Object Element Usage ``` ```
trans-unit.target: # # Utilização de elemento do objeto de XAML``` ```

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Animation.BackEase"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa uma nova instância do <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Animation.BackEase"> </xref> classe.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the amplitude of retraction associated with a <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Animation.BackEase"></xref> animation.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define a amplitude de retraction associado a um <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Animation.BackEase"> </xref> animação.

trans-unit.source: [!INCLUDE[DP_ID_field_label](~/add/includes/dp-id-field-label-md.md)] <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.BackEase.AmplitudeProperty> The larger the amplitude, the larger the retraction before and/or after the animation.
trans-unit.target: [!INCLUDE[DP_ID_field_label](~/add/includes/dp-id-field-label-md.md)]<xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.BackEase.AmplitudeProperty>Quanto maior for a amplitude, quanto maior for o retraction antes de e/ou após a animação.</xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.BackEase.AmplitudeProperty>

trans-unit.source: ![Demonstrates different aplitude values.](~/add/media/backease-amplitude.png "Demonstrates different aplitude values.")
trans-unit.target: ![Demonstra aplitude diferentes valores. ] (~/add/media/backease-amplitude.png "Demonstra aplitude diferentes valores.")

trans-unit.source: ## XAML Attribute Usage ``` ```
trans-unit.target: # # Utilização do atributo de XAML``` ```

trans-unit.source: The amplitude of retraction associated with a <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Animation.BackEase"></xref> animation.
trans-unit.target: A amplitude de retraction associado a um <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Animation.BackEase"> </xref> animação.

trans-unit.source: This value must be greater than or equal to 0.
trans-unit.target: Este valor tem de ser maior que ou igual a 0.

trans-unit.source: The default value is 1.
trans-unit.target: O valor predefinido é 1.

trans-unit.source: Identifies the <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.BackEase.Amplitude*> dependency property.
trans-unit.target: Identifica o <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.BackEase.Amplitude*>propriedade de dependência.</xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.BackEase.Amplitude*>

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: A adicionar.

trans-unit.source: Creates a new instance of the <xref href="System.Windows.Freezable"></xref> derived class.
trans-unit.target: Cria uma nova instância do <xref href="System.Windows.Freezable"> </xref> classe derivada.

trans-unit.source: When creating a derived class, you must override this method.
trans-unit.target: Ao criar uma classe derivada, tem de substituir este método.

trans-unit.source: Animation classes inherit indirectly from <xref:System.Windows.Freezable>.
trans-unit.target: Classes de animação herdarem indiretamente <xref:System.Windows.Freezable>.</xref:System.Windows.Freezable>

trans-unit.source: Because of this, you need to override the CreateInstanceCore method to construct a custom animation object.
trans-unit.target: Por este motivo, terá de substituir o método CreateInstanceCore para construir um objeto de animação personalizada.

trans-unit.source: The new instance.
trans-unit.target: A nova instância.

trans-unit.source: Provides the logic portion of the easing function that you can override to produce the <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Animation.EasingMode"></xref> mode of the custom easing function.
trans-unit.target: Fornece a parte da lógica da função easing que pode substituir para produzir o <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Animation.EasingMode"> </xref> modo da função easing personalizado.

trans-unit.source: This method transforms normalized time to control the pace of an animation for the <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.EasingMode> case of <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.EasingFunctionBase.EasingMode%2A>.
trans-unit.target: Este método transforma normalizado tempo para controlar o ritmo de um animação para o <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.EasingMode>caso de <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.EasingFunctionBase.EasingMode%2A>.</xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.EasingFunctionBase.EasingMode%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.EasingMode>

trans-unit.source: You only have to specify your easing function for the <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.EasingMode> case because the implementation of the <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.EasingFunctionBase.Ease%2A> method transforms `normalizedTime` for the <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.EasingMode> and <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.EasingMode> cases.
trans-unit.target: Só tem de especificar a sua função easing para o <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.EasingMode>caso porque a implementação do <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.EasingFunctionBase.Ease%2A>transformações de método `normalizedTime` para o <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.EasingMode>e <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.EasingMode>casos.</xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.EasingMode> </xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.EasingMode> </xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.EasingFunctionBase.Ease%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.EasingMode>

trans-unit.source: Normalized time (progress) of the animation.
trans-unit.target: Hora (progresso) normalizada da animação.

trans-unit.source: A double that represents the transformed progress.
trans-unit.target: Um valor de duplo que representa o progresso transformado.
